Package BobcatLib.Hardware.Controllers

Class Logitech

java.lang.Object
BobcatLib.Hardware.Controllers.Logitech
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllerWrapper
public class Logitech extends Object implements ControllerWrapper
Wrapper class for the Logitech controller using WPILib's CommandJoystick. This class provides mappings for the controller's axes, buttons, and D-Pad.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final int
    LeftXAxis
    Axis index for side-to-side strafing.
    final int
    LeftYAxis
    Axis index for forward/backward LeftY.
    final int
    rotationAxis
    Axis index for rotation.
